Summary: Fireball Caught on webcam - Displayed amazing colors and emitted a pume of some sort
divs: sighting detailsi have been having odd experiences with ufo's and things of that sort so i decided to film the sky with my infrared webcam to see if i could capture anything. about 10 minutes into filming a large fireball type object flew directly over from north to south and i witnessed it along with my father live on the computer screen. immediately we ran right outside to see where it went and it was no where to be seen. it moved in a straight line and the colors were amazing, like nothing i'd seen before. my father who witnessed it said he heard a whistle\screeching noise along with it but i did not hear this, maybe due to excitement of the event. i've seen meteors, satellites, falling space junk, but nothing like this before. ive include the shortened clip of the fireball as the whole video is 12:38 minutes long - if needed i can supply the whole webcam clip.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Kalamazoo
There were no other sightings in Kalamazoo on or around November 4th 2012
